creator: mail@cs-ware.de
text:
I set up
ErrorDocument 500 /cgi-bin/error/error.pl?500

The second line of this perl-script is:
print "Content-Type: text/html\n\n";

When I call the script directly I get the correct content-type, but when an
error 500 occours on some other script, the output is passed as "Content-Type:
text/plain" to the client.

Sry, I haven't found the specified bug befor i created this bug-report

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 37938 ***
creator: mail@cs-ware.de
